EC2 - Instance Storage.EBS: Elastic Block Store - Is a volume (a network drive) that can be used in a instance
EC2 - Instance Storage.Data: It is used to persist data, even after termination. and they only can be mounted one instance at a time
EC2 - Instance Storage.az: it is bound to a specific availability zone
EC2 - Instance Storage.Delete on Termination: It means the volume will be deleted when the EC2 Instance get deleted
EC2 - Instance Storage.snapshot: Volume Backup, that can allow you to transfer trough regions (using Copy function)
